Posts.Content: dltouch wrote: i have had to biospy in two years this last one has scared me. i had the needle biospy done and at first they came back ng. then i went for my follow up. upon futher study they found dcis . i went to a oncology dr to talk with them and they tell me at first i dont have cancer then the next thing i know im having a gene test done that comes back neg . now i find out that thier are abnormalitiesÂ  that the braca does not test for ( whats that ) . then i find out that my sisters daughter has the genes and has ovarian ca. they want me to start tamoxifen and im scared of the side effects.. confused and scared .. please if the is any one that can help me ..... Dx 1/4/2009, DCIS, Stage 0, Grade 1, 0/0 nodes Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: just been dianosed and very confused as what to do dltouch vivre
